author: Not available
source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry
originalTitle: The Metrical Epilogue to MS 41, Corpus Christi College, Cambridge
englishTitle: The Metrical Epilogue to MS 41, Corpus Christi College, Cambridge

text.1: brego, rices weard,      þe þas boc ræde
text.2: and þa bredu befo,      fira aldor,
text.3: þæt gefyrðrige þone writre      wynsum cræfte
text.4: þe ðas boc awrat      bam handum twam,
text.5: þæt he mote manega gyt      mundum synum
text.7: and him þæs geunne      se ðe ah ealles geweald,
text.8: rodera waldend,      þæt he on riht mote
text.9: oð his daga ende      drihten herigan.
